Hero.title: A New Standard in
Hero.subtitle: Pioneering a new era of agricultural trade by connecting Indonesia's finest farms directly to the global market with integrity and innovation.

Mitra.title: Trusted by Leading Companies Worldwide
Mitra.subtitle: We are proud to partner with industry leaders who share our commitment to quality and sustainability.

AboutSection.title: Connecting Indonesian Agriculture to the World
AboutSection.description: With decades of experience, we have built a strong network of local farmers and global partners. Our mission is to deliver the finest Indonesian agricultural products to the world, ensuring quality, sustainability, and fair trade from the ground up.
AboutSection.value1_desc: Rigorous quality control at every stage.
AboutSection.value3_desc: Partnering with local farmers for mutual growth.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose AgroHarvestani?
WhyChooseUs.description: We are more than just an exporter; we are your strategic partner in bringing the best of Indonesian agriculture to the world.
WhyChooseUs.feature1_desc: From farm to port, we implement strict quality control to ensure every product meets international standards.
WhyChooseUs.feature2_desc: We partner with local farmers, promoting sustainable practices that benefit both the environment and the community.
WhyChooseUs.feature3_desc: With decades of experience, our logistics network ensures timely and efficient delivery to any destination.
WhyChooseUs.feature4_desc: We build long-term relationships based on trust, transparency, and a shared commitment to success.

OurProducts.title: Explore Our Premium Selection
OurProducts.description: A glimpse into our diverse range of high-quality agricultural exports, sourced directly from the best farms in Indonesia.

Testimonials.title: Trusted by Partners Worldwide
Testimonials.testimonial1_quote: The quality of cloves from AgroHarvestani is consistently outstanding. Their professionalism and reliable delivery have made them our go-to partner in Southeast Asia.
Testimonials.testimonial2_quote: We've been sourcing coffee beans for years. Their commitment to sustainable farming and fair trade is truly commendable and reflects in the product quality.

CTA.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
CTA.description: Contact us today to discuss your needs and discover how our premium agricultural products can benefit you. Our team is ready to assist you.

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch with AgroHarvestani
ContactPage.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our products, need assistance, or want to explore partnership opportunities, our team is ready to help.

AboutPage.title: Pioneering the Future of Agricultural Trade
AboutPage.subtitle: We are a team of passionate professionals dedicated to bridging the gap between Indonesia's finest agricultural producers and the global market.
AboutPage.storyTitle: Our Story: From a Vision to Reality
AboutPage.storyContent_p1: AgroHarvestani was founded on a simple yet powerful idea: to showcase the incredible quality and diversity of Indonesian agriculture to the world, while empowering the local communities who make it all possible.
AboutPage.storyContent_p2: We saw an opportunity to create a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable supply chain. By leveraging technology and building direct, ethical partnerships with farmers, we are redefining what it means to be a modern agricultural exporter.
AboutPage.visionContent: To be the most trusted and innovative bridge for Indonesian agricultural products to the global stage, fostering sustainable growth for our partners and communities.
AboutPage.missionContent: To consistently deliver superior quality products through ethical sourcing, rigorous quality control, and exceptional customer service, creating lasting value for all stakeholders.
AboutPage.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make.
AboutPage.value1_desc: We operate with transparency and honesty in all our dealings.
AboutPage.value2_desc: We are committed to the highest standards of quality and service.
AboutPage.value3_desc: We promote practices that protect the environment and support communities.
AboutPage.teamSubtitle: The driving force behind our commitment to excellence.

ProductsPage.title: Our Agricultural Products
ProductsPage.description: Explore our comprehensive catalog of premium Indonesian agricultural products, meticulously sourced and processed to meet the highest international standards.
ProductsPage.cloves_desc: Aromatic and high-oil content cloves, perfect for culinary and medicinal uses.
ProductsPage.cinnamon_desc: Sweet and spicy cinnamon sticks, sourced from the highlands of Sumatra.
ProductsPage.nutmeg_desc: Fragrant whole nutmeg from the Banda Islands, the original 'Spice Islands'.
ProductsPage.coffee_desc: Single-origin organic Arabica beans with notes of chocolate and citrus.
ProductsPage.mangosteen_desc: The 'Queen of Fruits', known for its sweet, tangy flavor and rich antioxidants.
ProductsPage.coconut_oil_desc: Cold-pressed virgin coconut oil, pure and rich in nutrients.
ProductsPage.shallots_desc: Crisp and flavorful red shallots, a staple in Asian cuisine.
ProductsPage.turmeric_powder_desc: High-curcumin ground turmeric, known for its vibrant color and health benefits.

ProductDetails.cloves_long_desc: Our premium cloves are sourced from the fertile volcanic soils of Indonesia. They are hand-picked at the optimal time to ensure the highest oil content and a strong, pungent aroma, making them ideal for culinary spices, essential oils, and medicinal applications.
ProductDetails.cinnamon_long_desc: Indonesian Cassia cinnamon is renowned for its intense, sweet, and spicy flavor. We provide high-quality cinnamon sticks, ground powder, and broken cinnamon, all processed under strict quality control to preserve their natural oils and aroma.
ProductDetails.coffee_long_desc: Our single-origin Arabica coffee beans are grown in the highlands, offering a complex flavor profile with notes of chocolate, citrus, and a hint of spice. We work with farmers who practice sustainable and organic farming methods.
ProductDetails.mangosteen_long_desc: Our fresh mangosteen is handpicked at peak ripeness to ensure optimal sweetness and juiciness. Known as the 'Queen of Fruits', mangosteen is rich in antioxidants and offers a unique flavor that is both tangy and sweet.
ProductDetails.coconut-oil_long_desc: Our virgin coconut oil is cold-pressed from fresh coconuts, retaining its natural nutrients and aroma. It is ideal for culinary uses, skincare, and haircare, providing a pure and healthy option for consumers.
ProductDetails.nutmeg_long_desc: Our whole nutmeg is sourced from the Banda Islands, known as the original 'Spice Islands'. Each nutmeg is carefully harvested and dried to preserve its rich aroma and flavor, making it perfect for culinary and medicinal uses.
ProductDetails.shallots_long_desc: Our red shallots are cultivated in the rich soils of Indonesia, known for their crisp texture and robust flavor. They are carefully harvested and packed to ensure freshness, making them a staple ingredient in various culinary dishes.
ProductDetails.productNotFound_desc: Sorry, we couldn't find the product you were looking for.
ProductDetails.turmeric-powder_long_desc: Our turmeric powder is made from high-quality, dried turmeric rhizomes. It has a high curcumin content, providing a vibrant color and numerous health benefits. Ideal for culinary use and as a natural supplement.
